item.title: Emily add a quote by Brian Andreas
item.description: "You're the strangest person I ever met, she said & I said you too & we decided we'd know each other a long time." -- Brian Andreas

item.title: Emily add a quote by Brian Andreas
item.description: "They came to sit & dangle their feet off the edge of the world & after awhile they forgot everything but the good & true things they would do someday. " -- Brian Andreas

item.title: Emily add a quote by Brian Andreas
item.description: "In the end, I think that I will like that we were sitting on the bed, talking & wondering where the time had gone." -- Brian Andreas

item.title: Emily add a quote by Brian Andreas
item.description: "I saw them standing there pretending to be just friends, when all the time in the world could not pry them apart. " -- Brian Andreas

item.title: Emily add a quote by E.B. White
item.description: "If the world were merely seductive, that would be easy. If it were merely challenging, that would be no problem. But I arise in the morning torn between a desire to improve the world and a desire to enjoy the world. This makes it hard to plan the day." -- E.B. White

item.title: Emily add a quote by John Irving
item.description: "It is amazing to me, now, how such wild imaginings and philosophies - inspired by a night charged with frights and calamities - made such perfectly good sense to Owen Meany and me, but good friends are nothing to each other if they are not supportive." -- John Irving

item.title: Emily add a quote by Jalal Ad-Din Rumi
item.description:
"Out beyond ideas of wrongdoing and rightdoing there is a field. I'll meet you there.
When the soul lies down in that grass the world is too full to talk about." -- Jalal Ad-Din Rumi

item.title: Emily add a quote by Adam Arcuragi (The Song the Sinner Sings)
item.description: "...sitting cross-legged with our faces stretched in smiles..." -- Adam Arcuragi (The Song the Sinner Sings)
